name: Trick or Sweet
description:
Spooktober Jam 2020 entry. Theme: Mask the truth

Our first game in Love2D and Lua.

Submission from myself and Alex Fisher. All art by me in msPaint, which is why it sucks lmao "thats just the aesthetic".

'You're an incorrigible little ghost who is determined to ruin your old Boss's sweet factory just in time for Halloween. Break things with your ghost buddies to distract him so you can add nasty things to his sweet mixture, and stack up points and combos as you do! The more you add in one go while his back is turned, the more points you score.'
